nexttext: From this Lagrangian, we obtain the following cross section for the process $\chi (k_1) + \chi (k_2) \rightarrow f(p_1) + \bar{f}(p_2)$
mathml:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.Ex1.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\displaystyle\mathcal{L}" display="inline"><mi class="ltx_font_mathcaligraphic">ℒ</mi></math>
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.Ex1.m2" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\displaystyle=\dfrac{d_{6}}{\Lambda^{2}}(\bar{\chi}\gamma^{5}\gamma^{\mu}\chi)%
(\bar{f}\gamma_{\mu}f)" display="inline"><mrow><mi/><mo>=</mo><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msub><mi>d</mi><mn>6</mn></msub><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">Λ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>χ</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mi>γ</mi><mn>5</mn></msup><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mi>γ</mi><mi>μ</mi></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mi>χ</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>γ</mi><mi>μ</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mi>f</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></math>
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.E1.m2" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\displaystyle+\dfrac{d_{8}}{\Lambda^{4}}(\bar{\chi}\gamma^{5}\gamma^{\nu}\chi)%
\bigg{[}\left(\partial_{\rho}\bar{f}\right)\gamma_{\nu}\left(\partial^{\rho}f%
\right)\bigg{]}\,." display="inline"><mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msub><mi>d</mi><mn>8</mn></msub><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">Λ</mi><mn>4</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>χ</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mi>γ</mi><mn>5</mn></msup><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mi>γ</mi><mi>ν</mi></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mi>χ</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo maxsize="210%" minsize="210%">[</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mo>∂</mo><mi>ρ</mi></msub><mo>⁡</mo><mover accent="true"><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>γ</mi><mi>ν</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mo>∂</mo><mi>ρ</mi></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mi>f</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo maxsize="210%" minsize="210%" rspace="4.2pt">]</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>.</mo></mrow></math>

prevtext: From this Lagrangian, we obtain the following cross section for the process $\chi (k_1) + \chi (k_2) \rightarrow f(p_1) + \bar{f}(p_2)$
mathml:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.Ex2.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\displaystyle\sigma=\dfrac{1}{v}\dfrac{v^{2}}{3\pi\Lambda^{8}}" display="inline"><mrow><mi>σ</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>v</mi></mfrac></mstyle><mo>⁢</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msup><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mi>π</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">Λ</mi><mn>8</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></mrow></mrow></math>
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.Ex2.m2" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\displaystyle\sqrt{1-\dfrac{m_{f}^{2}}{m_{\chi}^{2}}}\,(2m_{\chi}^{2}+m_{f}^{2%
})\bigg{\{}|d_{6}|^{2}\Lambda^{4}+|d_{8}|^{2}(2m_{\chi}^{2}+m_{f}^{2})^{2}" display="inline"><mrow><mpadded width="+1.7pt"><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>-</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msubsup><mi>m</mi><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msubsup><mi>m</mi><mi>χ</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mfrac></mstyle></mrow></msqrt></mpadded><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>2</mn><msubsup><mi>m</mi><mi>χ</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>+</mo><msubsup><mi>m</mi><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo maxsize="210%" minsize="210%">{</mo><mo stretchy="false">|</mo><msub><mi>d</mi><mn>6</mn></msub><msup><mo stretchy="false">|</mo><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">Λ</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mo stretchy="false">|</mo><msub><mi>d</mi><mn>8</mn></msub><msup><mo stretchy="false">|</mo><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>2</mn><msubsup><mi>m</mi><mi>χ</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>+</mo><msubsup><mi>m</mi><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mrow></math>
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.E2.m2" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\displaystyle-\Lambda^{2}\bigg{(}d_{6}d_{8}^{*}+d_{6}^{*}d_{8}\bigg{)}(2m_{%
\chi}^{2}-m_{f}^{2})\bigg{\}}\,," display="inline"><mrow><mo>-</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">Λ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo maxsize="210%" minsize="210%">(</mo><msub><mi>d</mi><mn>6</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>d</mi><mn>8</mn><mo>*</mo></msubsup><mo>+</mo><msubsup><mi>d</mi><mn>6</mn><mo>*</mo></msubsup><msub><mi>d</mi><mn>8</mn></msub><mo maxsize="210%" minsize="210%">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>2</mn><msubsup><mi>m</mi><mi>χ</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>-</mo><msubsup><mi>m</mi><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo maxsize="210%" minsize="210%" rspace="4.2pt">}</mo><mo>,</mo></mrow></math>
